game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to Quest Giver.
game.description: Rumors say the artifact is hidden deep in the forest, seek it out and bring it back safely.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare enchanted weapon

task.objective: Explore the forest and locate the artifact's hidden location.
task.description: The first clue is a large oak tree with carvings near the riverbed.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian and retrieve the artifact.
task.description: A powerful creature guards the artifact, defeat it to claim it.
task.location: Forest, Heart of the Ancient grove
